rows.label: qst502008_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, that weird machine
is unusual, isn't it?

rows.label: qst502008_msg0002
rows.name:
It was salvaged, but apparently
no one knows how to use it.

rows.label: qst502008_msg0003
rows.name:
My dad said it doesn't seem to be
broken, but he's at a complete loss.

rows.label: qst502008_msg0004
rows.name:
He says a lot of salvaged
items can be activated with
lightning power, but...

rows.label: qst502008_msg0005
rows.name:
It seems there's no one in Avaritia
with enough power for that.

rows.label: qst502008_msg0006
rows.name:
If you're confident,
why not give it a try?

rows.label: qst502008_msg0101
rows.name:
That weird machine... I wonder
what'll happen if it's activated?

rows.label: qst502008_msg0102
rows.name:
My dad said it doesn't
seem to be broken, but
what it does is a mystery.

rows.label: qst502008_msg0103
rows.name:
You're going to activate it with
your lightning power, right?
